name: Abo Khashem
description: Start your adventure in the City of Torrid! Fight enemies in a whole new way, develop your entrepreneurial skills, explore dangerous dungeons, and discover hidden treasures! Experience the captivating journey of Abo Khashem.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 3000 MB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 4000 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Core i7 Memory: 4000 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4000 MB available space
